subject: Partnership Enquiry
description_text:
Hey Simsonn Team,

I’m Lucas Young — I create sim racing content centered around POV driving,
DIY sim builds, and hardware reviews. I came across your pedal sets
recently and was really impressed with the engineering and design quality.
I’d love to explore the possibility of reviewing them on my channel and
sharing some in-depth testing content.

Could you let me know what your process or requirements are for
collaborating with creators? I’d be interested in learning how you usually
handle review partnerships or product testing opportunities.

My goal is to create authentic, detailed reviews that showcase how high-end
hardware performs in real sim racing setups — and I think your pedals would
be a great fit for that.

Thanks for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you.

Best,

Lucas Young

youtube.com/lucasyoungracing

lyoungracing@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Lucas,  The YouTube link you provided cannot be opened.

Sorry about that, here is the correct link

https://www.youtube.com/@LucasYoungRacing


On Wed, 5 Nov 2025 at 5:02 pm, service@simsonn.com

Hi Lucas,   ​  Thank you for reaching out — we’re really excited about the possibility of working with you!   Could you please send your proposal or share a brief outline of your content plan? We’d love to review it and explore how we can work together on this project.  Looking forward to your reply!   Best regards, The Simsonn Team         ​

Hi Simsonn Team,

Thank you for getting back to me, I really appreciate the opportunity.

Here’s a brief outline of my content plan:

Main Review Video (YouTube): A detailed POV-style review showing the build
quality, setup, and performance of the Simsonn pedals and handbrake in real
driving conditions.

Follow-Up Short Form Content (YouTube Shorts / TikTok): Short clips
highlighting installation, tuning, and driving impressions across different
sim titles like Assetto Corsa and BeamNG.

Long-Term Feedback: After extended use, I’ll share an update video or post
with my honest impressions and how the hardware performs over time.

I’d also love to feature the Simsonn handbrake I have already purchased
myself, alongside the pedals in my testing. Since much of my content
involves rally, drift, and mountain driving, the handbrake would be a
perfect addition to show how your setup performs across multiple driving
styles.

My goal is to create authentic, high-quality content that shows the
strengths of your hardware in realistic sim racing environments.

Thank you again for considering this collaboration, and I look forward to
hearing your thoughts.

Best regards,

Lucas Young

On Wed, 5 Nov 2025 at 6:48 pm, service@simsonn.com

Hi, just checking if my previous email was received?

Thanks,
Lucas

Hi Lucas,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused by our delayed response to your email. We have submitted your request, but it has not yet been approved by our manager. We can offer you an exclusive 20% discount. Would that be acceptable?

If it isnt feasible to send me a set to review then I will be glad to take
a 20% discount, is this for the official website or is it useable on
aliexpress too? I am located in Melbourne Australia.

On Tue, 11 Nov 2025 at 10:25 pm, service@simsonn.com
Hi Lucas,     Thank you for your understanding. You can use this exclusive discount code: Lucas20 (note this discount can only be used once).  Wishing your channel all the best! Have fun!

Awesome, thank you so much!

Is there an expiry date?

On Wed, 12 Nov 2025 at 2:26 pm, service@simsonn.com

Do you have an Australia based site?

On Wed, 12 Nov 2025 at 2:34 pm, service@simsonn.com
Hi Lucas,    We do not have a site in Australia, but you can purchase on our official website.
